overview: The legend returns. The long awaited missing films of John Holmes from the golden age of adult entertainment. The one and only John Holmes returns in this long awaited collection of classic erotic. Adam and eve is proud to present the King, "John Holmes" in an explosive look at some of the greatest adult entertainment ever filmed.
tagline: The legend returns. The long awaited missing films of John C. Holmes from the Golden Age
title: John Holmes: The Lost Tapes
